mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT (REPORTNUM, SESSIONID, COMMUWRITER, PURPOSE, COMMUBNO, COMMUTITLE) VALUES(SEQ_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{sessionId}, #{commuWriter}, #{purpose}, #{commuBno}, #{commuTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUBNO, COMMUTITLE, COMMUCONTENT, COMMUWRITER, COMMUREGDATE, COMMUUPDATEDATE, COMMUVIEWCNT, COMMUBOARDSTATUS FROM TBL_COMMUBOARD WHERE COMMUBNO = #{commuBno}
